Docs.summary: Instances of this class are added to the event queue when pan gestures have been detected.
Docs.remarks: Only supported on platforms with gesture support (currently mobile). For events of this type to be generated, the method must be called to enable this gesture type.

Docs.summary: Gets the distance and direction moved during the course of the gesture so far, in pixels.
